channel.description: manage Slack channels; create, archive, invite users etc

adduser.description: add (invite) new user to the channel

--name TEXT        name for the new channel
--private BOOLEAN  should the new channel be private

Options.description: --user TEXT  user id to kick from the channel

Options.description: --topic TEXT  what to put in the topic channel

post.description: post a meessage to a given channel(s)

react.description: post a reaction to a given message in specific channel

Options.description: --timestamp TEXT  timestamp of the target message  [required]
--emoji TEXT      emoji name to react with  [required]

unpost.description: delete a meessage in a given channel

Options.description: --timestamp TEXT  Text to include in the message  [required]

unreact.description: remove a reaction to a given message in a specific channel

Options.description: --timestamp TEXT  timestamp of the target message  [required]
